title: events from apps are not saved on calendar
content:
I have a few apps on my phone where i can register to workouts. after i register it asks if i want to save it to my calendar and i click yes but it doesnt save it (yes, it has permission to access my calendar). 
its the same in a number of apps so i know its not a bug in the app. also, this feature worked on my previous phone (one plus) and now it doesnt. 
how do i fix this?
